title: WTB 1887 Allen and Ginter Jack Glasscock graded
author: tjenkins

posts.post_title: WTB 1887 Allen and Ginter Jack Glasscock graded
posts.post_content: I am looking to purchase a graded 1887 Allen & Ginter Captain Jack Glasscock. Prefer PSA or SGC but will look at anything. Looking to spend in the $250 to $450 range. Any grade will work as long as the card is not terribly creased up and presents descent. Post or PM scan and price. Thanks for looking!
Still looking if anyone has one to sell.
